item.title: Top Tech Conferences & Events to Add to Your Calendar in 2025
item.description:
A great way to stay current with the latest technology trends and innovations is by attending conferences. Read and bookmark our tech events guide.

item.title: Critical Zero-Day Vulnerabilities Found in These VMware Products
item.description:
A year after VMware ESXi servers faced ransomware attacks, new zero-day vulnerabilities are being exploited, posing risks to organizations worldwide.

Go to Source

item.title: EleKtra-Leak Campaign Uses AWS Cloud Keys Found on Public GitHub Repositories to Run Cryptomining Operation
item.description:
In the active Elektra-Leak campaign, attackers hunt for Amazon IAM credentials within public GitHub repositories before using them for cryptomining. Get tips on mitigating this cybersecurity threat.

Go to Source

item.title: Microsoft Azure AI Adds GPT-4 and New Virtual Machines
item.description:
Microsoft is working on creating guidelines for red teams making sure generative AI is secure and responsible.

Go to Source

item.title: Why is Apple Taking Legal Action Against UK’s Government?
item.description:
Apple told TechRepublic it is “gravely disappointed” to remove Advanced Data Protection in the U.K., as it fights government demands for an iCloud backdoor.

Go to Source

item.title: Australia Divided on DeepSeek Response: Industry Groups Call for Action, Minister Urges Caution
item.description:
Australian authorities disagree over the response the country should take to the runaway success of the Chinese AI app DeepSeek.

Go to Source

item.title: UK Announces ‘World-First’ Cyber Code of Practice for Companies Developing AI
item.description:
The Cyber Code of Practice applies to developers, system operators, and organisations that create, deploy, or manage AI systems.

item.title: DeepSeek Locked Down Public Database Access That Exposed Chat History
item.description:
Research Firm Wiz Research began investigating DeepSeek soon after its generative AI took the tech world by storm.

item.title: 6 Best UCaaS Providers of 2025
item.description:
Learn about the best UCaaS providers for new or small businesses, remote teams, traditional offices, global enterprises, and everything in between.

item.title: Zoom Phone Review (2025): Should You Pick Metered Calling?
item.description:
Learn more about metered vs unlimited calling options through Zoom Phone. Find out if your business might benefit from their budget-friendly VoIP phone plans or if you’re better off with a more feature-rich alternative.

item.title: Google, Apple Under Investigation to Determine Compliance with New UK Competition Law
item.description:
If Google or Apple is deemed to have Strategic Market Status in the U.K., the government might force it to make the user data it collects available to competitors, or give publishers more control over how their data is used.

Go to Source
